reviewText:
this was a pretty decent volume episode. I love the time attacks segment but, the rest was garbage.

I wish they put up more info about the cars.

Very cool coverage of the Tsukuba super lap. It is not dubbed in English but I would not like it as much if it was. The cast and crew are very funny and the cars are awsome. The HKS evo, STIs, R34s, etc are all here. I highly recommend it(along with any Video Option volume) to any fan of JDM cars or just awsome driving.
